Package play.filters.components

Interface CSRFComponents

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AkkaComponents, ConfigurationComponents, CryptoComponents, HttpConfigurationComponents, HttpErrorHandlerComponents

    public interface CSRFComponents
extends ConfigurationComponents, CryptoComponents, HttpConfigurationComponents, HttpErrorHandlerComponents, AkkaComponents
